job_description:
Company Overview

Stream Systems (www.streamsystems.ca) is a leading-edge technology company that enables enterprises to optimize and make better decisions. Our SimOpti intelligence platform brings AI, machine learning and simulation to power business intelligence across complex operations, in any industry. Our entire team of talented individuals is growing quickly; we are targeting 50-75% growth over the next fiscal year. At this pivotal moment in the company, we are embarking on new product roadmaps and new development allowing for this role to highly influence the product direction.

Position Summary

Reporting to the Software Development Manager and working under the supervision of Senior Lead UI Front End Developer, we are adding an experienced and skilled Intermediate to Senior UI Front End Developer to enhance our dedicated team. Your role will be instrumental in applying design principles to our product user interfaces and advanced visualization technologies. Your expertise in interface development should encompass data visualization, essential diagramming, and map visualization techniques. A passion for creating interactive and visually compelling interfaces that seamlessly present complex data dashboards is essential. Strong experience with Mapbox development is required.

You have:
Bachelor’s degree or formal qualifications from an institute of technology in computer science, with UI certifications
A Minimum of 5 years of experience in user interface development utilizing modern web-based technologies with distributed event API architectures and Cloud product platforms.

What You’ll Be Doing
Implementing UI product requirements to increase customer acquisition through the WOW factor by simplifying ease of use and reducing complexity in user experience.
Collaborate with development and product teams to efficiently implement Streams UI brand.
Actively participate in scrum and product standups to improve epic, story, and task understanding.
Work closely with the Senior Lead UI Developer prioritizing tasks and delivery UI component quality.
Add value to continuously improving code reviews.

Highly Preferred Expertise And Experience

You have industry leading expertise in UI development using many of the following:
Innovative use of tools and technologies such as HTML, CSS3, JavaScript, Typescript, ReactJS, NextJS, etc.
Solid understanding of GIT, Npm, NodeJS, RESTful API, GraphQL, database and query systems like PostgreSQL/MongoDB, and performance technologies such as client server caching.
Experience implementing Mapbox libraries as components in product and custom applications as well as proof of concept and rapid application development projects.
Solid work experience with Atlassian Jira Work Management, Confluence Collaboration, Bitbucket, Jenkins, Visual Code or IntelliJ, and knowledge of processes such as continuous delivery, CI/CD and DevSecOps.
Familiarity of structure and style of architecture especially event driven microservices.

Work environment/Hours/Location

This is a full-time position based on a 40-hour work week. We are driven by objectives, however, not timesheets. Stream’s head office is location in Calgary, Alberta with remote workers located across the country in British Columbia, Ontario, and Quebec. We are happy to provide a hybrid work environment, enabling you to work both remotely and in the office. This role is specific to Calgary, Alberta. We encourage a strong collaborative culture and provide workspaces in the office for team collaboration, design, planning sessions and social activities.

Benefits

Company benefits are available to our full-time, permanent employees and include extended health care, dental, long-term disability, AD&D, and life insurance for you and your dependents. If you love that small-company, feel with big-company goals, Stream just might be a fit for you.

Come do great things with us!
